description:
Email Marketing is a must, in this day and age. You can't create one email, paste contacts in the CC section of Gmail and consider that email Marketing. That is spamming ! And I still get such emails from some people. It pissed me off so much that I had to create this course and provide it for youÂ .

Learn MailChimp step by step . This course is well structured. Every section covers something related. My recommendation is that you learn from the first video to the last one. You can also jump to the section that interests you.

All the best. Leave your feedback once you watch this course.

Register for the course right now.
title: Mailchimp tutorial :Step by step in depth
